title: 4U
lyrics:
Loving the cold, loving the pain
Loving the fear, seeking the gold
I rip my shoulders
I can see clear
Ending is near
Just wait a few years

I will repair, I will stay sober



I close the window

I shut the door

No time for strangers

I usually don't open up

I usually don't open up

I usually don't open up

But if I would, and if I could, then I would do it for ya



For you

For you

For you

And I would do it for you

For you

Mmmh

Mmmh

And I would do it for you



Letting it go

Leaving the years, leaving the time

Still away from my mind

Childhood is over

Don't come too close

Then I will run

Running around, running away

Away from your warm thing



I close the window

I shut the door

No time for strangers

I usually don't open up

I usually don't open up

I usually don't open up

But if I would, and if I could, then I would do it for ya



For you

For you

For you

And I would do it for you

For you

Mmmh

Mmmh

And I would do it for you

For you

For you

For you

And I would do it for you



I've been down

I've been lost

Had my dark days

Life will come



For you

For you

For you

And I would do it for you

For you

Mmmh

Mmmh

And I would do it for you

For you

For you

For you

And I would do it for you

For you

(I would do it for ya)

And I would do it for you
